text_block_list.text:
During training one day. I felt
a gaze and looked up to see…

The person looking at me was someone
I didn't recognize. I assumed it
was a fan or a visitor.

At the end of training, she was still
looking at me. … Is there something she
wants to talk about?

Ah… I'm sorry. I hope I didn't
interrupt your practice.

I'm glad to hear that! Actually, there
is something I would like to talk to
you about.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
I'm Etsuko Otonashi, a reporter
for "Twinkle Monthly".

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
… I watched your training and was
greatly impressed. I would love to
support you both with articles. I have
been waiting to discuss this with you.

She seems polite and sincere. With her
considered articles, she may be able to
gain <chrname> some fans.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your willingness. So,
let's get right to it… What do you
consider when deciding on a training
plan?

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
… I see. So your role as a trainer is
to—
choice_data_list: It's to help my Uma Musume achieve her dreams!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
In other words, you're prepared to do
whatever it takes to make sure that
the horse girl in your charge reaches
her dream!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
When she trains you train with her, when
she's tired you provide hot springs,
when she's thirsty you would scoop water
from mountains!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Ahh… I'm floored… with your
determination as trainer. I'll turn this
into an article that will blow their
minds…!

This is how I came to know a — in 
many ways— powerful supporter…!
